overview: Anna is a beautiful stylists who cuts quite a figure when she's not cutting hair. Emilio is just a guy like you or I, who doesn't dig a haircut, unless it's Anna under the apron. And then it's a shear, unadulterated pleasure.  Let adult's most awarded director Paul Thomas take you on a trip to the barber. Vivid style, where butch is more than a cut, bob is what they do on your dick, and no top is ever a flat top. Top that Shave and a haircut...two tits!
title: Blow Dry
